Meine berufliche Reise ist ebenso einzig: My professional journey is as unique as it is fulfilling. I began as a passionate, professional ballet dancer, which bestowed upon me an eye for aesthetics and precision. I utilized this artistic foundation as a stepping stone into the digital world when I founded one of the first online shops in 1998, seamlessly integrating my hobby and profession. The rapid developments in the digital field inspired me to expand my skills, leading me to pursue further education as a front-end developer. With this newfound knowledge, I am able to handle the technical aspects of my online business independently, and I am now ready to shape new and exciting projects as a junior front-end developer. I look forward to collaborating with you and bringing your ideas to life. Welcome to my world!
Here you can find some of my work. They were created during my training at the Developer Academy. Have fun trying!
